actions.text: On agreeing to the Rouda amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Rouda.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rouda amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part F of House Report 116-200 to direct the Department of the Interior to make the information from the inspections and payments made into the Ocean Energy Safety Fund required by the bill available to the public, including information related to the operators, facilities, amounts paid into the fund, and inspection results.
purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part F of House Report 116-200 to direct the Department of the Interior to make the information from the inspections and payments made into the Ocean Energy Safety Fund required by the bill available to the public, including information related to the operators, facilities, amounts paid into the fund, and inspection results.
